6184729_style_6: Robotic bronchoscopy performed for RUL nodule and LUL Chartis assessment. Ion platform used to navigate to 1.4 cm RUL lesion. Cone beam CT confirmed tool-in-lesion. TBNA and cryobiopsies obtained. BAL performed. Chartis evaluation of LUL showed no collateral ventilation. Patient extubated and stable.
